datas.title: Received the Best Student Paper Award for the research paper “A Poly-Log Approximation for Transaction Scheduling in Fog-Cloud Computing and Beyond” at the 27th International Symposium on Stabilization, Safety, and Security of Distributed Systems (SSS 2025).
$1000 NSF travel award from SPAA 2024 conference
$1,000 travel award from the Graduate School, Augusta University
$650 NSF Student Travel Awards for CANS conference
$1,000 travel award from the Graduate School, Augusta University
$100 NSF travel award to attend the 3rd Data Science Workshop at Augusta Universit
$340 NSF travel award to attend the (DISC) conference
Star Performance Excellence Award at Sanima Bank Ltd
Granted a full scholarship for a Master of Science in Computer Engineering from Pokhara University
Participated in International Conference on Cryptology and Network Security (CANS)
Participated in The Southeast Regional Programming Languages Seminar
Participated in International Symposium on Distributed Computing (DISC) conference
Served as a member of the Kathford FOSS Community at Kathford International College, guiding participants in the EVOLVE 2.0 software competition
Achieved First Runner-Up in a software competition at Kantipur engineering
